Instruction: Cook the slice of bacon in a skillet over medium-high heat until crispy. Remove and set aside. Lower the heat to medium. Add the egg to the skillet and sprinkle with corn. Cook for under 10 seconds.

Place the tortilla on top of the cooked egg. Once the egg is set and adhered to the tortilla, flip it over and add the bacon on top. Spoon salsa over the bacon, then wrap it up. Take it out of the skillet, slice into small pieces, and serve while hot.
